content.body:
Thanks to everyone who filled in the recent plenary survey.

The November 2022 plenary meeting will be a hybrid meeting in A Coru√±a, Spain on 29 November.

https://github.com/tc39/Reflector/issues/444#issuecomment-1228363201

bakkot: Well, I guess I disagree here; I'd rather take that pushback as it comes. So far, everyone I've asked to sign this form has done so without complaints. If someone does push back, then in that case we can do the extra effort to make sure their contribution doesn't have IPR.

bakkot: Well, I guess I disagree here; I'd rather take that pushback as it comes. So far, everyone I've asked to sign this form has done so without complaints. If someone does push back, then in that case we can do the extra effort to make sure their contribution doesn't have IPR.

content.body: (and at that point, yes I agree this is editor discretion)

content.body: As a student I would not have pushed back, I'd've just either done that work or disappeared forever
content.org.matrix.msc1767.text: As a student I would not have pushed back, I'd've just either done that work or disappeared forever

content.body: I guess I care more about reducing our exposure than being open to contributions from people who are wary of signing an agreement like this
